element.name: TECRulerScale
element.short: Class is used as a subclass of TECRuler.

element.name: TPointerStyle
element.short: Style of the ruler pointer.

element.name: TPointerMode
element.short: Mode of the pointer on a ruler.

element.name: TECRuler
element.short: Visual component - advanced ruler.
element.descr:
TECRuler makes properties published only.
TECRuler cannot have focus.
TECRuler just displays scale. It can have fixed or movable pointer optionally.

element.name: TCustomECRuler
element.short: Base class for TECRuler. No abstract methods, no published properties.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.CaptionAlign
element.short: Alignment of the Caption.
element.descr:
Negative values: Alignment to the edge of the component.
0: Centered alignment between the edge of the component and the beginning (or to the end) of the scale.
Positive values: Alignment to the beginning (or to the end) of the scale.
In case of positive or negative values, absolute value abs(CaptionAlign) is indentation.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.CaptionPos
element.short: Position of the Caption. Left or right for horizontal rulers, top or bottom for vertical rulers.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.IndentBottomRight
element.short: Indentation of the scale from the right/bottom side of the border of the ruler.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.IndentTopLeft
element.short: Indentation of the scale from the left/top side of the border of the ruler.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.Max
element.short: Maximum.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.Min
element.short: Minimum.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.PointerColor
element.short: Color of the pointer.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.PointerMode
element.short: Mode of the pointer. epmMovable moves pointer on mouse hovering.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.PointerStyle
element.short: Style of the pointer (solid, dotted or dashed).

element.name: TCustomECRuler.PointerWidth
element.short: Width of the pointer.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.Position
element.short: Actual position of the pointer on the ruler.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.PositionToHint
element.short: Denotes that current position is displayed as the Hint of the component.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.Reversed
element.short: Reversed slider, i.e. from Max to Min.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.Scale
element.short: Subclass.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.ScaleFontOptions
element.short: Font options of the scale. Determines font-size, color and font-styles (bold, italic) of the values.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.ScalePos
element.short: Position of the scale on the component. Scale can be aligned to the top/bottom (horizontal ruler) or to the left/right (vertical ruler).

element.name: TCustomECRuler.OnChangePosition
element.short: Triggered when Position is changed.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.Transparent
element.short: Transparent ruler. This does not have to work on all platforms.

element.name: TPointerMode.epmMovable
element.short: Pointer moves on mouse hovering. Can be moved by code too.

element.name: TPointerMode.epmFixed
element.short: Pointer is visible but does not move on mouse hovering. Can be moved by code only.

element.name: TPointerMode.epmNone
element.short: No pointer is displayed.

element.name: TCustomECRuler.MouseCoord
element.short: Distance [pixels] of the mouse cursor from the left/top edge of the ruler (depends on Orientation).

element.name: TOnChangePosition
element.short: Event method. Triggered when position of the pointer on the ruler is changed.
